about.title: About Us
about.description: We are committed to a generational mission to rebuild Haiti through unity, technology, and community-driven development.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: We are working across 11 mission areas, from education to healthcare, farming to infrastructure. Each project serves a bigger vision of dignity and peace.

blog.title: Latest from Our Blog
blog.description: Catch up on the stories, voices, and updates shaping the New Haiti movement.
